name: Contrast (itch) (MagicGaming)
description:
Contrast is a game where you change the colors of the world to make it to the end.

This is just a demo so there is only 1 level. There are secrets inside the game so try to find them.

The controls are in the settings under controls.

I forgot to say you can click R to restart

https://forms.gle/LhhJCdQjBEDKVmyL7
